content: mystical supplies needed dragon scale ● j -6mm crochet hook ● #4 worsted yarn - approx 110 yards or less ​ pouch ● scissors ● yarn needle ● decorative beads optional will need wider ​ ​​ opening ● my favorite yarns to use suggestion only - ​ red heart super saver stripes or variegated yarns gauge/ measurements this is worked with a medium/loose gauge you can adjust hook size to get whatever size pouch you want 1st round approx 1 5 across 2nd round approx 2 75 -3 across 3rd round approx 4 across pouch stands approx 5 5 -6 tall and can be made larger/smaller using different hook sizes/thinner yarn/bulkier yarn pattern by andrea r williams / wickedly handmade stitch guide email wickedlyhandmade@gmail com ​ ★ slip_stitch - slip_stitch ​ website www wickedlyhandmade com ★ chain - chain ​ ​ ★ st/ sts - stitch/stitches facebook ​ ★ single_crochet - single_crochet www facebook com/wickedlyhandmadedesigns ​ ★ double_crochet - double_crochet instagram ​ ★ v st - v_stitch www instagram com/wickedlyhandmade ​ ★ croc st - crocodile stitch ​ written in us terms skill level intermediate ​ disclaimer open in web browser as adobe may not open properly any information or photos within this pattern are the sole copyrighted property of wickedly handmade do not copy and paste or share any of the information within this pattern if you so wish please share the direct link to the pattern this pattern is not for resale however items made using the pattern can be sold by the maker if you would like to give credit for the pattern you can tag either wickedly handmade s facebook page or instagram handle thank you so much for choosing our pattern and we hope you love it if there are any questions feel free to contact us at any time by email through our facebook page or our instagram page we will do our best to reply as quickly as possible special pattern notes ❏ this pattern uses the magic_ring or magic_ring - if this isn t something you know how to do youtube has great tutorials however there will be an alternative way to start on the pattern as well ❏ chain 3 counts as 1 double_crochet double_crochet st ❏ chain 4 in the v_stitch counts as the 1st double_crochet st and the chain 1 ❏ the body of the pouch alternates row of v_stitch & crocodile stitches again for visuals youtube has great video tutorials on the crocodile stitch you will also find an explanation & photo guides below ❏ instructions below will also show how you will anchor down the scales to give this a more uniform and controlled look ❏ you can make this pattern larger or smaller by using different yarns and hook sizes if desired special stitch definitions here you will find instructions and photo guides on how to complete a few of the different stitches v st - v_stitch this stitch round is your ​ build off round
